summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the preparation of the 2019 State of the Office letter. It includes a forwarded message discussing potential topics, with a specific mention of 'Epstein, ? Second trial?' indicating internal consideration of the Epstein case as a notable office matter for the year.

persons.name: Adams
persons.context: Appears as a recipient of an internal email regarding the 2019 State of the Office letter within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Consideration of Epstein Case for Office Summary
events.description: Internal email discussion within the U.S. Attorney's Office about what to include in the 2019 State of the Office letter, with 'Epstein, ? Second trial?' posed as a potential topic.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York, One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an internal email from May 2020 within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
It discusses compiling the 2019 'State of the Office' letter, an annual summary of office activities.
The forwarded message explicitly asks 'Epstein, ? Second trial?' as a potential topic for inclusion, indicating the case was a significant matter for the office in 2019.
The email shows the Epstein case was actively considered for highlighting in an official internal summary of the office's yearly work.
